title: Establishing ultraporous permanently polarized hydroxyapatite as a green and highly efficient catalyst for carbon dioxide conversion in continuous flow under mild conditions
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2871-2884
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00305E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marc Arnau, Jordi Sans, Pau Turon, Carlos Alemán
Ultraporous permanently polarized hydroxyapatite catalysts are successfully used as an alternative to conventional industrial catalysts for the production of value-added chemical products from CO2 under truly sustainable and green conditions.
